git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201272 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Switch to Xerces 2.5.0 to resove performance issue with attributes
   with large value fields (think data protocol images in xlink:href).
2) Few minor improvements to the handling of URL's in CSS.
3) Some documentation improvements/additions.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201273 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Image elements now propogate all UI event types.
2) Better prevention of non-computed tiles being put in Tile Cache
3) Swing components now use visibleRect rather than bounds for visible
   area.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201274 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Batik now passes all non SMIL-Animation tests from the SVG Working Group
   beSuite.
   a) zoomAndPand!=magnify now disables all transform controls in Squiggle
      (zoom, pan, rotate, etc).
   b) @font-face src property now supports format function.
   c) Invalid CSS properties now signal the user but doesn't stop the
      processing of the document.
2) The addition of event attributes is now handled properly.
   The removal of any attribute no longer detaches all attribute event
   handlers from the subtree.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201275 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1/ remove usage of JavaNativeMethod to avoid problems with current Rhino
CVS modifications.
2/ fix a bug that was preventing in some cases the listeners to be removed
because the listenerMap was not shared among all the pointers on some
EventTarget


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201276 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed a bug with getExtentOfChar().  It used to return the bounds in
   the coodinate system of the SVG element (I don't know why...)
2) The SVGPoint returned by getStart/EndPositionOfChar now supports
   'matrixTransform'.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201277 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Now disposes BridgeContext when GVT tree is built so CSSView is reset.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201278 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) clientX/Y should now be correct when the event target is a text element.
2) selectSubString should now work.
3) Text layout should be very marginally faster.
4) BridgeContext.dispose() is now called a bit later when transcoding
   (for nodes that need access to CSS when rendering - multiImage basicly).


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201279 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Infinate loop in selectSubString is fixed.
2) Text selection test now derives off JSVGRenderingAccuracy test so
   the results are images with highlighted text.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201280 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Bugfix in parsing some TrueType fonts fixed (thanks to Eric Bloch).
2) I/O exceptions from loading images now reference the image element
   in question.
3) Removed some now unused test files.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201281 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Better user notification when fetching a font face fails for
   security reasons.
2) Improved the external resource access test.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201282 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated manifests and policy files for move to xerces_2_5_0


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201283 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) The CSS engine now applies the 'all' media type to all content.
   ('all' media type is the default for @import).
2) The image transcoders now default w/h to 400x400 if they can't get
   a good definition anywhere else.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201284 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) The Text content interfaces now include all characters but throw
   DOM exceptions when the glyphs for a particular character aren't
   visible.
2) JSVGCanvas/Component are back to using getBounds for rendering region
   (this makes it work with a standard JScrollPane (although it will
   create an offscreen buffer the full size of the document - not just the
   visible portion of the document).
3) New test of text_content interfaces.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201285 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed a bug in property change propogation.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201286 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Initial layout of text and especially changing text paint properties
   is now much faster.
2) The properties opacity/filter/masking/pointer-events now work
   on the 'svg' Element.
3) Fixed a problem with clearing the Text selection.
4) setURI(null) now just calls setSVGDocument(null) - test updated.
5) Now uses ExtensibleSVGDOMImplementation to import foriegn documents
6) Zoom interactor now works properly even when over changing content.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201287 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Modification to comply with latest Rhino builds


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201288 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Zero w/h image elements no longer cause problems with rendering.
2) You can now get correct bbox information for zero w/h items
   (circle, ellipse, rect, image).
3) Ammended zeroSize test to test both of these.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201289 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Now fills/strokes text for geometricPrecision rather than using
drawGlyphVector.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201290 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) PNGTranscoder now omits Gamma chunk of GAMMA_KEY is 0.
   It will also suspend srGB intent generation if KEY_GAMMA is provided.
2) All catches of Throwable now catches ThreadDeath as a special case.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201291 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added support for importing DocumentFragment nodes in importNode(...)


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201292 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

removeAttributeNode was no longer working with attributes without namespace
check for namespace before removing now
update test case to test both attribute with and without namespace


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201293 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Refactored font resolution code so it's centralized in
   batik.gvt.font.FontFamilyResolver.
2) Fixed a bug in error handling of 'bad' filters.
3) Refactored code for ImageElementBridge - may help Fop add
   back JPEG optimization.
4) Refactored code in UpdateManager mostly to hide a bunch of
   internal methods.  Made the 'repaint' method more thread safe.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201294 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added Public keys file to CVS.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201295 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moving site to use apache mirrors for distributions.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201296 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Updates to documentation (prep for mirroring).
2) Fix for src-zip target.
3) New reference for cssMediaList (includes 'all' media match).


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201297 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) More documenation work for new release/archive/nightly structures.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201298 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Update header


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201299 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) 'getCssText()' on style that have URI's does not return the
   absolute version of the URI it returns the original css Text.
   It does return the absolute version for getStringValue().
   For computed values it always returns the absolute version of
   the URI.
2) Added test for #1 that checks all property types that accept
   URI's in SVG.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201300 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed a bug in handling of the 'cursor' property.
2) createSVGTransform now returns a transform with a type of MATRIX.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201301 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Update documentation for Apache mirroring.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201302 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated MAINTAIN file to explain how to make a release with new
apache mirror structure.

PR: 23030 - SVG Graphics2D has inverted text anti-aliasing
PR: 23038 - Docs for  all-jar target
PR: 23079 - TextNode.getBounds returns wrong bounds.
PR: 23177 - javadocs now uses splitindex


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201303 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added instructions to the site update section in MAINTAIN. Javadoc will now have the Batik version information in its title


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201304 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Dynamic modification of 'display' property now works correctly.
2) Multiple Image elements referencing the same SVG image should now
   correctly handle events (and may be more efficient).
3) Dynamic modificaiton of marker properties should now work.
4) Fixed a small bug in adding elements as siblings of elements
   with display none that could result in improper display order.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201305 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Updated test for markerUpdate.svg is now an update test instead of an
   interactive test.
2) MemoryMonitor has a small thread safety fix.
3) mail-lists page has been updated to reference the apache eyebrowse
   archives.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201306 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fix for clipping when transcoding to PDF.
2) I actually added the modify of display test this time :)


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201307 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed a bug in the handling of Cmap type 4 TrueType fonts in
   ttf2svg.
2) The UpdateManager now disposes the BridgeContext before calling
   UpdateManagerStopped event listeners.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201308 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Images are once again displayed as 'broken links' when the URL
   can not be opened.
2) The 'explination' works again for broken link images and should
   be more useful than previously.
3) Updated some regard references.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201309 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Modifying the visibility of images at runtime now works properly.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201310 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Greatly reduced the inital overhead of pointer events.
Now computes 'sensitive bounding box' from source geometry bounding boxes
rather than from union of sensitive regions.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201311 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) No longer builds area objects for sensitive regions,
   now passes hit test point to shape painters directly.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201312 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Added Tonny Kohar's contribution to Batik - Thanks Tonny!
2) Added JSVG a very simple SVG viewer to the contrib area.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201313 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) elem.style.setProperty now works for short hand properties.
2) Incremental improvement to the Update Region colecing code
   (modest gain for documents that move lots of things at once).
3) Cool update region debug tool (uncomment the SVGUpdateOverlay
   in JSVGComponent).
4) Minor fix in Aspect ratio fitting for transcoders.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201314 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed potential race condition in the JSVGComponent for setSVGDocument.
2) Fixed potential race condition in Timers.
3) PDF Transcoder now uses 72dpi for it's Useragent (As this is what
   the PDF Graphics2D is setup to handle).


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201315 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a problem with squiggle from my race condition fixes.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201316 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed NPE in event dispatch.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201317 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Another try at fixing the race condition in setSVGDocument.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201318 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Use default JVM max memory setting.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201319 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed memory leak when 'use'd content changes.
2) More Race condition work
3) JSVGCanvas now delays setting Canvas side until after onload event if any.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201320 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed NPE in RectListManager when the rect list was empty.
2) FePointLightElement now returns the Z attribute not Y when appropriate.
3) The glyph element's d attribute now uses the winding-rule property value
   from the text element not from the glyph element (as per the SVG
   specification)


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201321 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Finally fixed the race condition in setSVGDocument.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201322 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The A element now respects 'preventDefault' on the event object.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201323 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) The style element will no longer generate multiple xml:space
   attributes.
2) The SAXDocumentFactor will now generally generate just one
   CDATA node for each CDATA section in an XML Document.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201324 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

add ILOG Discovery to the product list using Batik


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201325 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Always try and provide a ClassLoader to LocalizableSupport
2) Made PaintServer.convertPaint public.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201326 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Memory leak with addEventListener and objects which have a reference
   to the event target is fixed.
2) Click events in the document now allow for a small amount of movement
   between mouse down/up (From Zach Del's improved JSVGCanvas - working
   on incorporating his XJSVGScroller into Batik!).


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201327 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Added Zachary DelProposto's Scroll pane class.  It can be found
   as batik.swing.JSVGScrollPane.  There is a nice example application
   in the contrib area.
2) Added a new flag to turn off the recenter on resize behaviour in
   JSVGComponent/Canvas.
3) Fixed a bug (#24919) in setting precision (from Simon Turner).


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201328 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Removed unused inner class.
2) Removed trace statement.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201329 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

General code cleanup of JSVGScrollPane.  Behaviour should be the same
or very similar.  Most notable I made a number of members and methods
protected to promote extensibility.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201330 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201369 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Big change in the handling of loaded documents.
   When a new Document is loaded a new BridgeContext is created for
   it.  This prevents most issues with Memory leaks as the new
   document doesn't get 'attached to' the BridgeContext for the
   main document.  It also means that each document get's it's
   own CSS engine as it should.

   The major change here is that the Document Loader no longer has
   an associated BridgeContext. So when it loads a document it no
   longer does a BridgeContext.initialize.

   However BridgeContext.getReferencedElement will create the
   'sub' BridgeContext and initialize the document before returning
   it.  Things are still a little hokey since it isn't generally
   safe to 'dispose' of such a subContext because the document could
   currently be shared in several instances.  However I think that
   currently the Document is the only object that has 'outside'
   references in the new setup - so the whole thing can go to
   GC.

   This appears to fix the image memory leak.

2) Line element no longer has a fill associated with it.

3) Fixed bug #29416 - problem with empty quotes in CSS.

4) Index out of bounds error fixed in linear gradient.

5) AOI problem in PrintTranscoder now fixed.

6) Null Pointer exception when PrintingTranscoding documents
   using SVG fonts is fixed (the BridgeContext was being
   disposed of too early).

7) PrintTranscoder now uses UserAgent to report exceptions
   rather than silently swallowing them.

8) Fixed some minor bugs in the GlyphLayout code for flow regions.

9) Very minor tweaks in JSVGScrollPane.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201370 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. GenericBridges are now handled more uniformly, so that extension
   elements which do not inherit from AbstractGraphicsNodeBridge and are
   not for title or desc elements will have their handleElement method
   called.
2. Fixed tool tip handling bug.
   (http://issues.apache.org/eyebrowse/ReadMsg?listName=batik-dev@xml.apache.org&msgNo=1007)
3. Changed BridgeExtension to allow extensions to specify if a particular
   extension element should cause the document to be dynamic.
4. Fixed fill-rule bug. (#28679)
5. Implemented getX() and getY() methods of text elements.
6. Fixed NPE in SVGList if the list is empty.
7. Fixed NPE in SVGTextElementBridge.getSubStringLength if there is no text.
   (#28702)

2) Applied patch 28487, fixed enabled/disabled state fot

3) Added support for 'deselectAll' SVG DOM call.
4) Fixed NPE regression with Images in a dynamic context.
5) Fixed rendering regression with use elements in a dynamic context.
6) Added support for get[Screen]PixelUnitToMillimeterX/Y
7) Fixed bug in text selection (programatically selected text wouldn't
   clear properly.
8) Updated a number of reference images
9) Permission tests now allow 'stopThread' - modifyThread prevents
   stopping other threads.
10) Tweaks to memory leak tests.

   with the current flowRoot and potential spec instability).

   the SVGDOMImplementation is now extensible.  There is a
   new baseclass ExtensibleDOMImplementation that provides
   extension capabilities to any DOMImplementation subclass.

   properties in SVG 1.2

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201410 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Massive performance improvement (>10X) for drawing on Mac OS X.
2) The DOM tree viewer now has an option to hide text nodes that

   tree view if it has one.

   DOM tree.  I also tweaked the way text and CDATA sections are
   created.

8) New test for visibility updates.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/branches/svg12@201417 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

This branch 'svg12' will be used for major additions to the codebase
for SVG 1.2 support.

1. Implementation of DOM Level 3 Core, Events and XPath.  DOM 3
   XPath is achieved with Xalan, a jar of which is now included in
   the libs/ directory.

   Due to problems with DOM 2 interfaces being included with
   JDKs < 1.5, there are some peculiarities to access DOM 3 specific
   methods and constants from interfaces that existed in DOM 2
   when working in JDKs < 1.5.  I'll put a page on the wiki
   detailing this.

2. Tests for DOM 3 support.

3. Conditional compilation based on JDK version.  Files in the
   sources-1.4/ directory will be compiled only for JDKs >= 1.4,
   while those in source-1.3/ will be compiled only for JDKs < 1.4.
   Files in the sources/ directory will still be compiled for all
   JDK versions.

4. SVG 1.2 WheelEvent support.

This branch 'svg12' will be used for major additions to the codebase
for SVG 1.2 support.

1. Implementation of DOM Level 3 Core, Events and XPath.  DOM 3
   XPath is achieved with Xalan, a jar of which is now included in
   the libs/ directory.

   Due to problems with DOM 2 interfaces being included with
   JDKs < 1.5, there are some peculiarities to access DOM 3 specific
   methods and constants from interfaces that existed in DOM 2
   when working in JDKs < 1.5.  I'll put a page on the wiki
   detailing this.

2. Tests for DOM 3 support.

3. Conditional compilation based on JDK version.  Files in the
   sources-1.4/ directory will be compiled only for JDKs >= 1.4,
   while those in source-1.3/ will be compiled only for JDKs < 1.4.
   Files in the sources/ directory will still be compiled for all
   JDK versions.

1) Improved consistency of events from the RunnableQueue.
   Calling suspend/resumeExecution should now always generate
   a runHandler event (although the events may be "compressed"
   so suspend/resume may only generate one resume event).
2) Fixed "no paint" bug with dynamic canvas as child of JSVGScrollPane
3) ScrollPane now should do a better job of fitting document w/o
   scrollbars

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/branches/svg12@201422 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed bug in handling kerning elements with multiple glyph entries
   in g/u 1or2.
2) title and desc changes are now dynamically tracked.
   New test for this.
3) getTotalLength, and getPointAtLength are now implemented.
   New test for this.
4) The Marker interface now has a 'getCharIndex()' method to
   get the index of the character the Mark is associated with.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201423 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Document.getElementById now uses a Hashtable to speedup lookups.
2) Regard now uses -Xincgc because the memory leak tests behave better.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@201424 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Removed use of 'getTagName' to use 'getLocalName' to avoid issues with
   prefixed svg elements.
2) Fixed a mistake in the generation of SVG fonts that include
   arabic forms (PR 33733)
3) Moved closer to DOM 3 idea of 'idness' for attributes.  This lets
   me turn of 'idness' for cloned 'use' subtrees.  This avoids cluttering
   the global hash with bogus 'id' instances.  No one should ever match
   these 'ids' anyways.
PR: 33733

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/branches/svg12@201429 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed handling of complex paint types (base types with
   fallbacks).
2) Fixed CSS SVG DOM interfaces for complex paint types
   (see bug 33923).  Added new test for same.
3) Text Selection events are now generated even when the
   done event is not over a graphics node.
4) The double '#' bug is gone in the SVG Pretty Printer. PR 33890
5) The worst of the 'extra spaces' problem with the pretty printer
   is solved.  It will still tend to create white space before
   and after element tags (start & end).  Probably the best
   solution for this would be to go to something like:
        <foo att1="bar
          >Some Text</foo
      ><baz ...
   This would eliminate much of the pressure to insert
   char data whitespace for formatting (it would also generate a
   more compact DOM).
6) Applied mailing-list patch from Jeremias (Thanks!)
   PR 33986

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@289122 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) Fixed PR: 36511 - Rendering error.
   Problem was that the rect list manager didn't recompute bounds properly.
2) Some of the performance fixes from the 'static' work.
3) Some more small tweaks to GeneratorContext precision.  Default 
   precision now matches previous default.  Also now correctly reports
   precision when it is the default.
4) Fixed SVG generator test-references to be in sync with changes.
5) Tweaked Memory leak test so it seems to actually work with the
   generational GC (it now basically just allocates memory until
   the objects are collected or it get's an OutOfMemoryError -
   not very elegant I know ;)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@290405 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixes a bug in the handling of 'x', 'y', 'width', 'height',
on feImage elements.  This may effect users of the filter
primitive element.  The previous behaviour fit the referenced
content to the intersection of the filter region with
the filter primitive region.  Now the content is fitted
to the filter primitive region but it's rendering is
clipped to the intersection of the filter primitive and
the filter regions.  I believe this is the correct behaviour.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@290928 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@291091 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Patch for improved WMF & Graphics2D from Herve Girod (PR 36309).
Thanks Herve!
1) XMLWriter now tries to avoid inserting whitespace (it's added
   inside tags before the close '>').  This means that the
   DOM generated will be different.  This avoids messing up generated
   tspans.
2) WMF Transparency doesn't seem to be carried through (testCard.wmf)
3) WMF Bitmap fill doesn't seem to align quite right (testCard.wmf)
4) Polygon2D & PolyLine2D should probably share a common base class.
5) SVGGraphics2D - attributed character iterator stuff is a bit
   different (handles more cases, more correctly I think).  Also
   drops back to stroking in a fairly configurable manner.
6) New regard test to turn WMF into SVG and compair with reference.

   This fixes text being drawn as text in PDF.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@385978 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Convert "" to null for namespace URIs given to public DOM interfaces.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@386238 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) 38990 - Fallthrough in CSSOMSVGColor fixed (Thanks Dieter)
    a) Most string concatenation uses are replaced with stringbuffer
    b) Added basic test of SVGColor interface.
2) Gradient Scaleback is now 0.999 rather than 0.97.
3) Major refactor of text in prep for removing TEXT_COMPOUND_DELIMITER,
   in static builds of GVT tree.
    a) Font derivation is now done in the Text Bridge.
       Needed since deriving an SVG font needs the element reference.
    b) FontFamilies are no longer attributed on string.
    c) Null TextPainterInfo (TPI) are now created/added in
       buildAttributedString (faster/cleaner).
    d) getElementStart/EndIndex now uses new fields in TPI so they
       are faster/simpler and don't rely on TEXT_COMPOUND_DELIMITER.
    e) getParentTextPaintInfo uses elemTPI and getParentNode
       to get parent TPI rather than complex/slow TEXT_COMPOUND_DELIMITER.



git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@388134 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Update Rhino to CVS version post 1.6R2, with some modifications,
   fixing some memory leaks from Java class caching.
2. Various updates of "xml.apache.org" to "xmlgraphics.apache.org"

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@388441 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@388496 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) SVG Text no longer forces reference to SVG DOM for static content,
   when using AWT fonts.  (SVG Fonts currently still hold a reference
   to the SVG Document).

2) In most places TEXT_COMPOUND_DELIMITER has effectively been
   replaced by TEXT_COMPOUND_ID.  TEXT_COMPOUND_ID has a unique
   value for each element in the DOM but retains no reference to
   the element.

   In dynamic documents TEXT_COMPOUND_DELIMITER is still bound on
   elements, with a hard reference to the DOM element.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@476799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Changed method of Version.java's version string for builds from SVN
   checkouts.  Version.java is now rebuilt from a template,
   Version.java.xsl in the same directory, as part of the build process.
2. Updated bundled ant to 1.6.5, to avoid performance problems found
   when determining the working copy revision for Version.java.
3. Updated bundled crimson to a version that's actually available to
   download from the crimson site.
4. Removed the xalan in the lib/build directory, since the (newer) one
   in the lib directory can be used instead.
5. Fixed the {bin,src}-{zip,tgz} ant targets.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@476803 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

some contribution to the general cleanup for the next version:
1.) replace some 'type var[]' with  'type[] var' - convention
2.) give some size-estimate to StringBuffer-constructors
3.) replace some simple string-concatenation from StringBuffer-append() to the string + string notation. The idea is to let the compiler choose between StringBuffer or StringBuilder to do it.
4.) replace some StringBuffer.append( "x" ) with .append( 'x' )
5.) replace some Vector with List/ArrayList
6.) change order of (public/final/static/) modifiers to standard order
7.) replace some manual copy-loops with System.arraycopy()


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@476924 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Fix compilation problem.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@476934 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Better Version number reporting.  The svn revision number is now
   stored in batik-util.jar's manifest, from where the Version class
   can read it.  For source distributions built with the src-zip or
   src-tgz ant targets, the revision number will be stored in a file
   called svn-revision.  The build script then picks this up instead
   of running svn info.  (Suggestions welcome on a better place/name
   for this file.)  Version.java is back to being an ungenerated file.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@478375 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Using XML Commons External 1.3.04 (xml-apis.jar and xml-apis-ext.jar), which
   now includes SAC, DOM 3 Core, and the SMIL Animation and SVG 1.1 DOM
   bindings.  Plus corresponding documentation changes.
2. Removed jaxp.jar from lib/build, since xml-apis.jar now includes JAXP.
2. The DOM Level 3 Events bindings have been updated to the latest draft,
   and are now included in the sources tree rather than precompiled in
   xml-apis-dom3.jar.
3. Custom event handling updated to match the new draft.  (No messy reflection
   any more.)
4. Rhino updated the 1.6R5, which is MPL licensed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@482124 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Encoding as specified in a Content-Type header's charset parameter is now
   honoured when scripts are loaded.
2. Changed InterpreterFactory so that multiple MIME types can be associated
   with a given Interpreter.  This breaks the extension interface, but since
   I already broke it before the 1.6 release (by adding the extra bool
   parameter to Interpreter's constructor) and nobody complained, I think it
   should be ok.  Any objections, let me know, and I'll make it a subinterface
   or something.
2. text/javascript, text/ecmascript, application/javascript and
   application/ecmascript are now all supported as script types for Rhino.
   Processing of application/ecmascript is as specified in RFC 4329.  This
   fixes bug 35549.

PR: 35549

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@489628 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Factored out SVG DOM class-specific updateAttributeValue/getUnderlyingValue
   methods into SVGOMElement.  Now animation updates need only a hash table
   lookup to find the LiveAttributeValue to update.  A couple of classes
   still have some string comparisons (e.g. SVGOMRectElement) since they have
   some pecularities like attribute defaults that need to be taken into
   account.  This behaviour should eventually be moved into the LAV classes
   themselves.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@490655 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Fixed bug with paced motion animation when the motion path contains
    move commands in the middle.
 2. Fixed bug with motion animation when keyPoints is omitted.
 3. Ignore keyTimes on animations with calcMode="paced".
 4. text elements are now motion animatable.
 5. Motion animation is now applied before the transform of an element,
    according to test animate-elem-24-t.
 6. Fixed inability to animate a line's x1/y1/x2/y2 attributes.
 7. Fixed bug in animateTransform from/to/by/values parsing.
 8. Fixed bug where a use element's x/y attributes where ignored when
    it has its transform or motion animated.
 9. Animations of attributes that can have only non-interpolable values
    now ignore calcMode and assume "discrete".
10. Insertions and removals of elements as children of switch elements now
    cause re-evaluation of which is rendered.  Updating the test attributes
    themselves still will not cause the switch to be re-evaluated.
11. Animation of the transform attribute of switch elements now works.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@491229 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@491739 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Fixed bug in transform animations with type="translate" when the y
   translation is omitted.
2. Allow stroke-width to be continuously animated.
3. Fixed bug in animation of numeric font-weight values.
4. Eventbase timing specifiers with no explicit eventbase now refer to the
   target of the animation, rather than just the parent.
5. Fixed bug where offsets in eventbase/syncbase/accesskey timing specifiers
   were ignored.
6. Fixed bug in accesskey() timing specifier handling.
7. Key events are now dispatched to the document element if there is no
   currently focussed element.  (This is the behaviour for all UI events in
   SVG 1.2, and since key events aren't strictly defined for 1.1, I think this
   change should be ok.)  This allows animation accesskey() timing specifiers
   to work regardless of the position of the mouse.
8. Activating a link will now used the current animated xlink:href value,
   rather than the base value.
9. Fixed problem with interval creation that caused event-initiated intervals
   not to become active if another was already active (or about to become
   active).
10. Fixed interval creation in the presence of a min attribute.
11. Fixed bugs in transform list animation accumulation and pacing.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@497002 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Initial Mac OS X support for Squiggle.  The screen menu bar is now used
   instead of menus on each browser window.  The build process now includes
   a script (lib/make-squiggle-app.sh) in the binary distributions which
   creates an application bundle for easy installation.  It also affords
   better OS X integration, by customizing the application name in the
   application menu and the dock, and provides a dock icon.

   The user still must run this script manually after unzipping the
   distribution, though, so it's not ideal, but it's better than including
   a whole Squiggle.app directory with the duplicated .jar files in it
   (and it doesn't seem to warrant having a separate download).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@581139 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Rendering accuracy tests modified so that variation images for different
platforms will be checked.  So for a given test abc/def/ghi.svg, the
test harness will check abc/def/accepted-variation/ghi.png and
abc/def/accepted-variation/ghi_<platform>.png, where <platform> is the
platform string.

The platform strings are taken from the
PreconfiguredRenderingTest.DEFAULT_VARIATION_PLATFORMS array, which
currently has "java6-linux" and "java5-osx" in it (the two platforms
I (Cameron)'ll be checking in variation images for).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/batik/trunk@594018 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Enhanced DOM Viewer window.  This commit is Ivan's patch from
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42697 with some
changes (reformatting, moving some classes to different packages).

The features of the DOM Viewer enhancements are, in Ivan's words:

  * Added better document inspection using the DOMViewer:
    - Added support for viewing elements of the document as xml
      and their attributes in the attributes table,
    - Allowed live tracking the changes in the document by refreshing
      the DOMViewer's document tree and the xml text area.
  * Added support for editing the documents through the DOMViewer:
    - Allowed changing elements directly by editing their xml,
      or using the attributes table,
    - Allowed switching nodes position in the document by
      adding the dnd support for the DOMViewer's document tree,
    - Allowed adding the most commonly used elements (element templates)
      with their attributes set to default values,
    - Allowed adding new elements by editing their xml directly,
    - Allowed removing the nodes from the document using DOMViewer's
      document tree.
  * Added support for history browsing. The DOMViewer is able
      to undo and redo the changes made from the DOMViewer,
      as well as the changes made on the document from outside
      of the DOMViewer. Added the scrollable drop down menu to
      support undo / redo of a custom number of last actions.
  * Allowed searching the element on the canvas from the DOMViewer
      and vice versa, by selecting the tree node in the document tree
      or on the canvas and painting the found element(s).
  * Added syntax highlighting to elements xml representation
      using JEditTextArea component. Created the enhanced JEditTextArea,
      the JEnhEditTextArea with the cut / copy / paste, select all,
      undo / redo shortcuts added and mouse wheel scroll as well.

Congratulations to Ivan, for successfully completing his Google Summer of
Code project.  I hope that he can continue to contribute to Batik!

Submitted by: Ivan Andjelkovic <andjelkovic.ivan@gmail.com>
